name: Tidal Scavenger
description:
2D Fish Survival Game.  Eat live smaller fish and fish carcasses of any size to fill your health bar while avoiding live fish that are bigger than you.  Beware of the rising and falling tides so that you aren't starved, eaten, or stranded*.

Made in Godot 3.5.1

*Some features still in development.

Controls

    Move - WASD or Arrow keys

    Boost - Spacebar

Development team

    Alan Winchester - lead dev

    Tyler Burger - art/dev

    Kristina Furches - art

    Brittany Whitener - sound

Sound/Music credits

Beautiful by AShamaluevMusic

One Bite of a Potato Chip on freesfx.co.uk
